meaningMnemonic: If it <kanji>appear</kanji>s to <kanji>exist</kanji>, then it's probably an <vocabulary>actual</vocabulary> thing... you know, existing and stuff. That should be pretty <vocabulary>obvious</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
